name: PhotoFox AI
tagline: Turn any product photo into 100+ on-brand assets in minutes
description: PhotoFox AI transforms a single product photo into a full campaign‚Äîstudio-grade photos, scroll-stopping videos, and ready-to-ship ads. Get 100+ on-brand assets in minutes, at a fraction of the cost of traditional shoots.

name: Meeting.ai
tagline: an AI notetaker built for visual learners
description: Introducing visual notes that help you remember 65% more information. Meeting.ai automatically turns your conversations into hand-drawn diagrams and visual summaries. Just tap start‚ÄîAI captures, transcribes, and creates memorable visual meeting minutes for you

name: Dockify
tagline: Customize and switch your Mac dock instantly
description: Take control of your Mac dock ‚Äî design multiple setups, switch with hot keys or automation with apple shortcuts app, and boost productivity with Dockify.

name: Kaylin AI
tagline: Full-service AI powered marketing for small businesses
description: Kaylin is an AI-powered full-service marketing for small businesses that crafts a social strategy, creates all the posts, and manages/schedules content on all your social media accounts, along with custom email marketing.

name: QuickDeploy
tagline: Deploy your web app to a VPS in minutes
description: QuickDeploy deploys your web app to your own Ubuntu VPS with a single command. It auto-detects frameworks like Next.js, builds an optimized Docker image, and sets up a reverse proxy for https and custom domains. Built for devs that need their app live quick.

name: Datablit
tagline: Customer Data and Intelligence Platform for Real-time Action
description: Datablit is a Customer Data & Intelligence Platform that simplifies data ingestion, enabling instant rule-based actions and in-depth analysis. You can also run experiments to see what's working and collaborate with teammates via text, audio, or video.

name: MakerBox
tagline: Your AI co-pilot for bios that get you hired and booked.
description: MakerBox is your AI co-pilot for personal branding‚Äîwriting platform-ready bios in seconds, polishing your profile visuals, and guiding your content strategy so profile views turn into interviews, clients, and followers.

name: Gomotion
tagline: Your brand, Your animations, In one Prompt
description: Gomotion is the world‚Äôs most advanced AI motion designer, like After Effects and Lovable had a baby. Create stunning brand animations instantly from either text or image prompts

name: ZenTrack - AI Habit & Focus Tracker
tagline: AI-powered habit tracker that learns your daily patterns
description: ZenTrack combines habit tracking with focus timers and AI insights. Build lasting habits, track Pomodoro sessions, and get personalized recommendations based on your actual behavior.

name: Cross Write
tagline: Write once. publish everywhere.
description: Publish your markdown posts to Hashnode & Dev.to in one click. Open-source tool for cross-platform content publishing.

name: Instastock
tagline: Any Stock Image, Instantly.
description: Generate unique, high-quality stock images that you fully own. No licenses, no restrictions - just your creative vision brought to life.

name: Appiverse
tagline: The right place to get early traffic for your app
description: Explore and showcase the best applications built on the Base44 platform. Discover new tools, manage your projects, and share your creations.

name: BugByBug
tagline: AI error tracker that tells you why bugs happen and fix it.
description: Tired of spending hours debugging? BugbyBug uses AI to instantly identify root causes of errors and crashes. Get actionable insights, not just logs. From stack traces to user impact analysis, we tell you exactly what broke and how to fix it.

name: DefendTab: Don't Close My Tab / Save Tab
tagline: DefendTab is a Smart Tab Protector - Chrome Web Store
description: üõ°Ô∏è DefendTab is the smart guard for your tabs. It prevents you from accidentally closing important pages, protecting your work and saving your sanity. Say goodbye to lost data and interrupted sessions forever!

name: Test your "Hunter" Skills
tagline: Simple game where you guess which PH product got more votes.
description: This little fun game helps you explore new products and develop an intuition for what succeeds on Product Hunt. Have fun! ü§ì

name: Aarambol
tagline: Personal and smart newspaper
description: Personal and smart newspaper. Aarambol is your intelligent, customizable news companion.

name: Lutify
tagline: AI Image Editor for Figma.
description: Image editing for Figma from filters and color grading to background removal and upscaling.

name: Amplitude Data Manager
tagline: Upload & update user properties, send events
description: Amplitude Data Manager lets you securely upload CSVs to update user properties and send events to Amplitude. Fast, private, and easy to use.

name: PushMarket.io
tagline: Web push notifications made simple
description: The most powerful web push notification platform. Instantly re-engage your website visitors. Deliver timely updates and promotions directly to their desktops and mobile devices with powerful web push notifications.

name: Vivid
tagline: Ship Software at the Speed of AI
description: Vivid lets you create apps and websites instantly by chatting with AI. Build stunning, responsive, and unique designs with zero code. Powered by cutting-edge AI for creators, entrepreneurs, and developers.
